mapper.insert: INSERT INTO party (id, party_regdate, party_service, party_subservice, party_title, party_member, party_id, party_pw, party_tel, party_start, party_end, party_charge, party_adult, party_notice, party_available) VALUES ( #{id}, #{party_regdate}, #{party_service}, #{party_subservice}, #{party_title}, #{party_member}, #{party_id}, #{party_pw}, #{party_tel}, #{party_start}, #{party_end}, #{party_charge}, #{party_adult}, #{party_notice}, #{party_available})
